message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $119. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $110 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $115.  Would that work for you?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference at $112.50?  I think that's fair to both of us.
